title: Man City Tripp-ed Up
description:
The FC crew discuss Manchester City's crucial comeback against Newcastle and ask whether City's poor performance is a sign for things to come. Plus, Chelsea show glaring weaknesses against a energetic Leeds side and Barcelona's attack gets back into rhythm with the help of Ansu Fati and Robert Lewandowski.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Man City escape shock loss against Newcastle; Leeds over-run Chelsea; Barcelona's attack bounces back
